comments: This is the r=20 member of the r-family of sequences S_r(n), n>=1, defined in A092184 where more information can be found.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Chebyshev polynomials.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (19,-19,1).
formula: a(n) = 1/16*{-2+[9+4*sqrt(5)]^n+[9-4*sqrt(5)]^n}. - _Ralf Stephan_, Apr 14 2004a(n)=(T(n, 9)-1)/8 with Chebyshev's polynomials of the first kind evaluated at x=9: T(n, 9)=A023039(n). _Wolfdieter Lang_, Oct 18 2004G.f.: x*(1+x)/((1-x)*(1-18*x+x^2)) = x*(1+x)/(1-19*x+19*x^2-x^3) (from the Stephan link, see A092184).
author: _Clark Kimberling_
